message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product at a price of $1500000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!  I believe its value to you will far exceed this price. Let's talk!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, my budget is set at $800000. I hope we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $800000 is significantly below what I believe this product is worth.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $1150000?  This is a fair price considering the incredible value this product offers.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but given my budget constraints, I cannot agree to a price above $800000. I am willing to increase my offer to $950000 if you're open to discussing further.
